glosses: more likely to be broken, fragile, brittle

examples.translation: Be careful! Glass cups are fragile

glosses: more open to get their feelings hurt, thin-skinned, oversensitive

examples.text: Çok kırılgan olduğu için onunla konuşmak çok zor.
examples.translation: It is very hard to talk with him since he is very thin-skinned.
